name: degrees (itch)
description:
You have 2:30 to mix the temperature of the rooms! Use the heater for hot air and open the windows for cold air. If every room has the right temperature in time, you win.

Controls

W, A, S and D : Movement

E : Interact

Tab : zoom out/in the camera

Credits

A game by: samu_g05tz

Sounds: freesounds.org

Programms I used:

Engine: Godot 3.4

Graphics: Krita(Concept Art) & Aseprite (Pixel Art)

Music: FL Studio 20
